5.20. langdefs Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block langdefs
  ...
  !endblock

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The langdefs filter is used to configure programming language properties used by SDF's pretty-printing support. The contents is one or more vgrind definitions.

Examples

See langdefs.sdm within SDF's stdlib directory.
